original_title: Two Women and the Rock Garden
overview: This documentary film is a compilation of archival footage and images, a recollection of memories, and a conversation of two women. It centers on the relationship between the twin as they separate and have their own family. The changes are layered by the conversations riveted on the experiences of the twin as women and as mothers. The documentation of their lives will always be remembered along with the currents of the beach and the echoes of the animals.
title: Two Women and the Rock Garden
